name: spl.js
description: SpatiaLite and friends - sqlite, geos, proj, rttopo - for node and browser.

scripts.test:chrome: browserify --plugin esmify test/browser.js | tape-run --static test --browser chrome --keep-open
scripts.test:firefox: browserify --plugin esmify test/browser.js | tape-run --static test --browser firefox --keep-open
scripts.test:all: npm run test:em && npm run test:node && npm run test:electron
scripts.build:web: npm run build:worker && node scripts/stringify && rollup -c rollup.config.web.js --bundleConfigAsCjs
scripts.build:web:debug: npm run build:worker -- --configDebug && node scripts/stringify && rollup -c rollup.config.web.js --bundleConfigAsCjs --configDebug
scripts.build:all: make em && npm run build:em && npm run build:web && npm run build:node

author: Jan Vaillant
